title: Ryuuganime JSON Schema for Anime Database, v2.0-s
description:
Anime JSON Entry Validator in JSON Schema of Ryuuganime.
Performance issues or else may occurs on this Schema while it's on Beta version.

version.description: Detail of entry database model version used on file

id.description: Serial ID number on Ryuuganime Database

createdAt.description: Date and time of creation based on first submission (commit/push). Uses ISO 8601 format

modifiedAt.description: Date and Time of data modification. Uses ISO 8601 format

titles.description: Serial title in several languages based on ICU locales identifier.

native.description: A serial title in native language. Including, but not limited to: Japanese, Chinese, and Korean

en_Latn.description: A serial title in romanizated form

en_US.description: A serial title in American English

zh_Hans.description: A serial title in Simplified Chinese

zh_Hant.description: A serial title in Traditional Chinese

additional.description: Serial title in several additional languages based on ICU locales identifier that does not categorized as main languages

ar_001.description: A serial title in Modern Standard Arabic

es_ES.description: A serial title in Spain Spanish

ja_Kana_JP.description: A serial title in Japanese Hiragana/Katakana script

^[a-z]{2,3}(_[A-Z]{1}[a-z]{2,3})?(_[A-Z0.description: Serial title in custom (non default) languages.

synonyms.description: Serial title synonyms in several languages. Based on ICU locales

synopsis.description: A synopsis/plot of story of serial in several languages. Based on ICU locales

isAnime.description: Explain that url is using /anime path or not. Used for SIMKL URL path. Default: true

type.description: Serial type. Is it TV, ONA, OVA/OAD, Special, Movie, or Music

source.description: Source type of media that adapted from

isNsfw.description: Mark the serial if not safe for work

isLicensed.description: Explains if the work/serial is legally licensed, if not (case: fanwork) then value turns false

media.description: An object for media information of show

posterImage.description: A visual key/poster image URL of serial. Usually from The TVDB, Anime-Planet, or AniList

coverImage.description: A backdrop/background image URL of serial. Usually from The TVDB, The Movie DB, Fanart.tv, or Anime-Planet

promotionalVideo.description: List of promotional videos of current entry

soundtracks.description: A list of soundtracks used on shows

isrc.description: International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) ID of recording/track

from.description: Starting pointer of soundtrack/theme song on show

to.description: Ending pointer of soundtrack/theme song on show

not.description: Exception pointer of soundtrack/theme song on show

only.description: Pointer of soundtrack/theme song on show, ignoring `from` and `to` properties

year.description: The year of the serial release, using a integer/numeral format. If unknown, use 0

startDate.description: Start date of serial release, using YYYY-MM-DD format. If unknown, fill null

broadcastTime.description:
Local time of show broadcasted
FORMAT: hh:mm:ssTZD

endDate.description: End date of serial release, using YYYY-MM-DD format. If unknown, fill null

episode.description: Describes serial total episodes and duration

count.description: Total episodes of serial. If unknown, fill null

duration.description: Duration per serial episode, using minute format. If unknown, fill null

totalDuration.description: Total duration of the serial, using minute format. If unknown, fill null

countryOfOrigin.description: Country of origin of the serial. There are no country restrictions here. Using ISO 3166 format

tags.description: Represents serial specific tags/content. Similar to the `.genres`, but usually more focused on content, storyline, or themes. But, all of `.genres` value will be ignored ignored if present on `.tags`. See docuwiki for more information

isSpoiler.description: Explain if this tag is possible on/contains spoiler

isNsfw.description: Explain if this tag is possible on/contains adult contents

licensors.description: A company that allow the licensee to use, copy, or resell the contents or services under the original brand name or trademark, owned by the licensor

producers.description: Producers that involved to current entry/project

hashtag.description: Social media hashtag of shows. Sometimes used for campaign. Applicable for each SNS

officialWebsite.description: Links to official website of current entry

title.description: Title of the site. See docuwiki for more details

databases.description: A list of links to several database websites

museAsia.description: Set of official playlist by Muse Asia on YouTube in several languages

zh_Hant_HK.description: Playlist in Hong Kong Traditional Chinese subtitle

zh_Hant_TW.description: Playlist in Taiwan Traditional Chinese subtitle

wakanim.description: Sets of Wakanim sites regarding localizations

FR.description: Wakanim France, in French, is available in France and its overseas departments and territories, Belgium, Netherlands, Luxembourg, Switzerland, Tunisia, Morocco, Algeria and in Canada (Quebec).

SC.description: Wakanim Nordic, in English, is available in Sweden, Norway, Iceland, Finland, the Netherlands and Denmark.

DE.description: Wakanim DE, in German, is available in Germany, Switzerland and Austria.

RU.description: Wakanim RU, in Russian, is available in Albania, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Kazakhstan, Georgia, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Macedonia, Moldova, Poland, Romania, Russia, Saint-Marin, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia and Ukraine.

sign.description: Unique random characters made by contributor

only.description: Pointer on show, ignoring `from` and `to` properties

nabShowId.description: Show entry database number of X site

seasonNumber.description: Season of show entry database number of X site

seasonId.description: Season of show entry database id number of X site
